abstract: In an interview, Ryan Seacrest wouldn’t speculate about joining the show as a host should Matt Lauer leave when his contract expires at the end of the year: “Matt will have that post as long as Matt wants to have that post.”
snippet: In an interview, Ryan Seacrest wouldn’t speculate about joining the show as a host should Matt Lauer leave when his contract expires at the end of the year: “Matt will have that post as long as Matt wants to have that post.”
lead_paragraph: When Ryan Seacrest called on Thursday to talk about his investment in HDNet, the cable channel that will, with his help, become AXS TV later this year, we had to ask about his possible presence on another channel.

headline.main: As Seacrest Makes Deals, a Potential Role on ‘Today’ Still Looms
